00008 "struct g2t_event { \
00009         long eg_label; \
00010         long event_type; \

00027 typedef struct g2t_event_st {
00028         int eg_label; /* Event label from event generator */
00029         int event_type; /* specifies trigger, pileup, cosmic, laser */
00030         int ge_rndm[2]; /* geant random seeds at start of event */
00031         int merge_info[10]; /* as yet unspecified */
00032         int n_event; /* Event number */
00033         int n_part_neut_east; /* number of participant neutrons */
00034         int n_part_neut_west; /* number of participant neutrons */
00035         int n_part_prot_east; /* number of participant protons */
00036         int n_part_prot_west; /* number of participant protons */
00037         int n_run; /* Run number */
00038         int n_track_eg_fs; /* Number of final state event gen. tracks */
00039         int n_track_prim; /* Number of primary tracks (w/o parent) */
00040         int polarization[10]; /* polarization info, as yet unspecified */
00041         int prim_vertex_p; /* Id of first primary vertex in event */
00042         float b_impact; /* Impact parameter */
00043         float phi_impact; /* Azimuth of reaction plane */
00044         float time_offset; /* time offset in seconds wrt trigger event */
00045 } G2T_EVENT_ST;
00046 #endif /* G2T_EVENT_H */
